mapper.sql: MAC_NO, MAC_MODEL, ZONE_NO, ZONE_NAME, BRANCH_NO, BRANCH_NAME, SITE_NO, SITE_NAME, REPAIR_TIMES, LAST_REPAIR_TIME, STATUS
mapper.select: select round(nvl(t2.fault_count,0)/t1.mac_count*100,3) FAULT_RATE,t1.BRANCH_NO,t1.BRANCH_NAME from ( (select COUNT(MAC_NO) mac_count,BRANCH_NO,BRANCH_NAME from DM_MAC_TB group by BRANCH_NO,BRANCH_NAME) t1 left join (select COUNT(MAC_NO) fault_count,BRANCH_NO,BRANCH_NAME from DM_MAC_TB where STATUS = '2' group by BRANCH_NO,BRANCH_NAME) t2 on t1.branch_no = t2.branch_no) order by FAULT_RATE desc
select BRANCH_NO,BRANCH_NAME,count(*) COUNT,count(decode(STATUS,'1',1,null)) ONLINE_COUNT from DM_MAC_TB group by BRANCH_NO, BRANCH_NAME order by ONLINE_COUNT desc

select a.BRANCH_NO,a.BRANCH_NAME,nvl(b.repair_times,0) FAULT_TIMES from (select BRANCH_NO,BRANCH_NAME from SM_BANKS_TB group by BRANCH_NO, BRANCH_NAME) a left join (select BRANCH_NO,BRANCH_NAME,COUNT(r.REPAIR_ETIME) repair_times from DM_MAC_REPAIR_TB r join DM_MAC_TB m on m.MAC_NO = r.MAC_NO
r.FAULT_TIME between to_date(#{params.START_TIME},'yyyymmdd') and to_date(#{params.END_TIME},'yyyymmdd')
group by BRANCH_NO,BRANCH_NAME) b on a.branch_no = b.branch_no order by FAULT_TIMES DESC

select BRANCH_NO,BRANCH_NAME,round(c1/c2*100,2) REPLACE_RATE from ( select BRANCH_NO,BRANCH_NAME,count(decode(CHANNEL_NO,'CH005',1,NULL)) c1,count(decode(CHANNEL_NO,'CH000',1,null)) c2 from DM_BUSI_COUNT_TB
RECORD_TIME between to_date(#{params.START_TIME},'yyyymmdd') and to_date(#{params.END_TIME},'yyyymmdd')
group by BRANCH_NO,BRANCH_NAME ) order by replace_rate desc
select * from DM_MACTYPE_ASSESS_V

select a.SITE_NO,a.SITE_NAME,nvl(b.repair_times,0) FAULT_TIMES from (select SITE_NO,SITE_NAME,BRANCH_NO from SM_BANKS_TB group by SITE_NO, SITE_NAME,BRANCH_NO) a left join (select SITE_NO,SITE_NAME,COUNT(r.REPAIR_ETIME) repair_times from DM_MAC_REPAIR_TB R join DM_MAC_TB M on m.MAC_NO = r.MAC_NO
R.FAULT_TIME between to_date(#{params.START_TIME},'yyyymmdd') and to_date(#{params.END_TIME},'yyyymmdd')
group by SITE_NO,SITE_NAME) b on a.SITE_no = b.SITE_no
a.BRANCH_NO = #{params.BRANCH_NO}
order by FAULT_TIMES DESC
